name: Bladed Weapon Techniques
description: Learn efficient and deadly techniques for using knives and short blades in combat.

cards.title: Reverse Grip Slash
cards.description: A cutting technique using a reverse grip to create close-quarters control.
bulletpoints: Hold the blade in a downward grip
Use quick, slicing motions to target limbs
Keep the blade close to the body for control
cards.summaryText: Ride the reverse grip tight to your frame and carve quick limb-level slashes.

cards.title: Deflect and Stab Counter
cards.description: A defensive maneuver that redirects an attack and follows up with a stab.
bulletpoints: Parry the incoming strike using a small circular motion
Step off the centerline to avoid counterattacks
Follow up with a precise thrust to a vital area
cards.summaryText: Slip the attack with a tight parry, sidestep, and drive a pinpoint follow-up stab.
